DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose Project PROTECT evaluate two different intervention approach encourage young woman use dual method contraception . The individualized intervention computer assist , fully-tailored , interactive intervention base transtheoretical model behavior change . This intervention compare enhanced standard care intervention provide computer-based , non-tailored information advice regard use contraceptive method . The two primary outcome trial include : 1 ) behavioral outcome : report use dual method contraception ; 2 ) biological outcome : incident recurrent STI unintended pregnancy . The hypothesis trial : 1 ) individualize intervention result great increase dual contraceptive use standard care approach ; 2 ) individualize intervention would result great protection incident recurrent case sexually transmit infection unplanned pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Stage Matched Intervention Increase Dual Method Use
DOC.detailed_description: Protection sexually transmit infection ( STIs ) , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , unintended pregnancy achieve use dual method contraception . This proposal design develop , implement , evaluate impact innovative , computer-assisted stage-based individualized interactive intervention ( Individualized Intervention ) base transtheoretical compare enhanced standard care counsel use dual method contraception . Primary outcome , include behavioral biological outcome , assess randomized clinical trial 550 high-risk woman . Participants follow 6 month interval 24 month follow-up interview determine report use dual method contraception ( behavioral outcome ) . Clinical examination 12 24 month new onset symptom assess biological outcome include incident recurrent case STI unintended pregnancy . Secondary outcome include intermediate outcome variable change stage change , process change , decisional balance , self-efficacy . The primary hypothesis study : 1. Individualized Intervention result increase dual contraceptive use ; 2. Individualized Intervention result protection new case STIs , re-infection sexually transmit organism , unplanned pregnancy ; 3. Individualized Intervention lead great change secondary outcome measure . If find effective , stage-matched intervention potential widespread dissemination school , clinic , office , community center prevent STIs/HIV unintended pregnancy .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Englishspeaking 2 . Sexually active male partner past 6 month 3 . Desire avoid conception 24 month 4 .
